Row.Text: Border Toggles • Show city borders by default

Shows the city borders in the default view (no lens selected) when loading or starting a game, and for the Settler and Continent lens. You can still toggle it manually. [N] [N]Lenses from these mods also follow this setting: Discovery Lens, Treasure Lens, Search Natural Wonders.
Border Toggles • Show city borders for trade lens
Shows the city borders when you select a merchant or when you select the trade lens.
Border Toggles • Show city borders for map tacks (mod)
Shows the city borders while placing map tacks with the Detailed Map Tacks mod.
Border Toggles • Show city borders for religion lens (mod)
Shows the city borders with religion lenses from mods when loading or starting a game. You can still toggle it manually.
Logs debug messages to the UI.log. Only needs to be enabled when asked to help troubleshoot issues with this mod.
